test/fixtures/type-error/bad-assignment.ro
    1│ type i32
    2│ type f32
    3│ 
    4│ fun test(): f32 = {
     │             ^^^ Type mismatch: Type "i32" is not assignable to "f32"
    5│   var test = 1
    6│   test = 123.0
     │          ^^^^^ Type mismatch: Type "f32" is not assignable to "i32"
    7│   test
    8│ }
    9│
